In order to get there, I think you should cut out the pieces implement the correct version (your new code) into the new class. Get rid of the following __init__ arguments: scope (no longer used), layer_norm (assume true), and layer_norm_columns (assume true). Move all variable creation to the build method and the computation to the call method. For an example, see The LSTMCell implementation.
